rows.label: qst201907_msg0001
rows.name:
Here. We have found you
a replacement.

rows.label: qst201907_msg0002
rows.name: Wow! It's so pretty... Thanks, lady!

rows.label: qst201907_msg0003
rows.name:
Ohh... What an angelic little smile
you have...

rows.label: qst201907_msg0004
rows.name:
What would you say to joining our
own personal entourage?

rows.label: qst201907_msg0005
rows.name: Here she goes again...

rows.label: qst201907_msg0006
rows.name:
Hey, Rinne. How about we go
back to finding that "black-feathered"
Nopon now?

rows.label: qst201907_msg0007
rows.name:
Ah yes, that's right. It had completely
slipped our mind.

rows.label: qst201907_msg0008
rows.name: Maybe the girl can tell us some more.

rows.label: qst201907_msg0009
rows.name:
You want to know about the black
Nopon?

rows.label: qst201907_msg0010
rows.name:
Yes, we would. We would indeed!
Tell us everything you know!

rows.label: qst201907_msg0011
rows.name: Sure!

rows.label: qst201907_msg0012
rows.name:
Well, when I bumped into him,
he dropped this paper. Think
it'll help?

rows.label: qst201907_msg0013
rows.name:
How fortuitous! Our child, your actions
are commendable!

rows.label: qst201907_msg0014
rows.name:
It is only natural that you be offered
a VIP seat in our entourage!

rows.label: qst201907_msg0015
rows.name: Seriously, stop that!

rows.label: qst201907_msg0016
rows.name: Can't we just read the flipping memo?

rows.label: qst201907_msg0017
rows.name: ...As you wish.

rows.label: qst201907_msg0018
rows.name:
Ahem! Are you ready?
Then we shall begin.

rows.label: qst201907_msg0019
rows.name:
"Our next meeting will take place on
deck of Uzushio. Be there on dot,
not minute later!"

rows.label: qst201907_msg0020
rows.name:
So it's a meeting memo?
That practically leads us right to them!

rows.label: qst201907_msg0021
rows.name: So it seems.

rows.label: qst201907_msg0022
rows.name:
Just you wait, you black-feathered
fool... Justice will soon be served!
